ValidationRule.description: When ever the case status changed to closed, need to select the closed reason
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( NOT($Profile.Name='System Administrator')&& ISPICKVAL(Status,'NS_Closed')&& ISCHANGED(NS_AssignedTo__c )&&PRIORVALUE(NS_RecordTypeName__c) <> 'Email-to-Case', true,false )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Assigned To field cannot be modified when the Case is in Closed status. Please update the Status to Working prior to changing the Assigned To field.
